thread.section_title: Sports Jobs and Sports Internships - WorkInSports.com
thread.title: Sports Information Intern - College Sports

title: Sports Information Intern - College Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. ™ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Sports Information Intern   Serve as point-person for sports webcasting and online video presence for our Universitys varsity sports. Produce game handout programs. Write post-game stories/summaries for the web...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
